name: UpsertHubspotTasks
description:
Create or update tasks in HubSpot using a unique property.

This tool creates or updates HubSpot CRM tasks identified by a unique property value specified by the `idProperty` query parameter. Use this tool when you need to batch upsert tasks based on unique identifiers.

parameters.name: tasks_data
parameters.description: An array of task objects to be upserted. Each object must include `idProperty`, `objectWriteTraceId`, `id`, and `properties`.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: An identifier for tracing the creation request.

id.description: The unique ID of the object.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: An identifier for tracing the creation request.

id.description: The unique ID of the object.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
